content.d: It’s a leap year this year.
Oh yeah, I saw that on the morning news. Getting an extra day is certainly a treat~!
I’m glad because it means I can spend another day with you, Ai-san.
Do you wanna go to an arcade? I wanna challenge you to a 1v1.
Let’s come up with a punishment for the loser.
Sounds good. How about this? The loser has to escort the winner all the way home!
......That’s a punishment? I’d be happy to do it since we’d get to spend more time together.
You got me. But I figured even a punishment should be fun!
